sentences: His best-known release is the UK garage single "Joy" (2001) which reached No. 34 on the UK Singles Chart and number one on the UK Dance Singles Chart.
He was in the group M-D-Emm, which formed in 1988 and consisted of Ryder, Dave Lee (a.k.a.
As a solo artist, Ryder has released many records since 1990 under numerous aliases in the breakbeat hardcore, drum and bass, house and UK garage genres.
